item.title: CVE-2019-1010127|2024-08-05T03:07:18.079Z -- vcftools -- vcftools
item.description: VCFTools vcftools prior to version 0.1.15 is affected by: Use-after-free. The impact is: Denial of Service or possibly other impact (eg. code execution or information disclosure). The component is: The header::add_FILTER_descriptor method in header.cpp. The attack vector is: The victim must open a specially crafted VCF file.
